terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
Terms of Service
Last updated: February 2026

1. Acceptance of Terms
By downloading, installing, or using the Tankuy application ("App"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the App.

2. Description of Service
Tankuy is a fuel expense tracking application that allows users to record fuel purchases, monitor spending patterns, and manage vehicle information. The App may include features such as receipt scanning, spending analytics, and fuel station discovery.

3. User Accounts
To access certain features, you must create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to provide accurate and current information during registration.

4. User Content
You retain ownership of the data you enter into the App, including fuel records, vehicle information, and receipts. By using the App, you grant us a limited license to process this data solely for the purpose of providing our services.

5. Acceptable Use
You agree not to misuse the App, interfere with its operation, or attempt to access it through unauthorized means. The App is intended for personal, non-commercial use.

6. Data Accuracy
While we strive to provide accurate fuel price information and analytics, we do not guarantee the accuracy of any data provided by the App. You should verify important information independently.

7. Modifications
We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

8. Termination
We may suspend or terminate your access to the App at any time for violations of these Terms or for any other reason at our discretion.

9. Limitation of Liability
The App is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the App.

10. Contact
If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us through the App.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Privacy Policy
Last updated: February 2026

1. Introduction
Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how Tankuy collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our application.

2. Information We Collect
We collect the following types of information:
• Account information (name, email address)
• Vehicle details you provide (make, model, license plate)
• Fuel purchase records and receipts
• Usage data and app analytics
• Device information and location data (only when you use fuel station features)

3. How We Use Your Information
We use your information to:
• Provide and improve our services
• Generate spending analytics and reports
• Send relevant notifications
• Ensure the security of your account

4. Data Storage
Your data is stored securely on our servers. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access.

5. Data Sharing
We do not sell your personal data to third parties. We may share anonymized, aggregated data for analytical purposes. We may share data when required by law.

6. Your Rights
You have the right to:
• Access your personal data
• Correct inaccurate data
• Delete your account and associated data
• Export your data

7. Cookies and Tracking
The App may use analytics tools to improve user experience. You can opt out of analytics tracking in the App settings.

8. Driver's License Requirement
The App is intended for use by individuals with a valid driver's license. We do not knowingly collect or store data from people who do not possess a driver's license.

9. Changes to This Policy
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes through the App.

10. Contact
For privacy-related inquiries, please reach out to us through the App.
